name.ja: <ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>導<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>書<rt>しょう</rt></ruby><ruby>棄<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>却<rt>きゃく</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: You have 10 or more cards in your Deck.

effect.en: Excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck. Send all excavated DARK Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters and Spell Cards to the Graveyard. Shuffle the remaining cards into the Deck. If you sent 4 cards to the Graveyard by this effect, draw 1 card.
